SCTX:
Begin pemenieScript

short nolore
short pemannoy

if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_TraderAbandoned" >= 100 )
	Return
	;Do nothing if the quest is over
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_TraderAbandoned" < 10 )
	Return
	;Do nothing if the quest is over
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_TraderAbandoned" >= 10 )
		Journal "MV_TraderAbandoned" 110
		Return
	;sets journal when he dies.
	endif
endif


if ( GetPCCell, "Gnaar Mok" == 1 )
	if ( GetCurrentAIPackage == 3 )
		if ( GetDistance Player < 512 )
			Journal "MV_TraderAbandoned" 90
			ForceGreeting
			AiWander 0 0 0 60 40 20 0 0 0 0 0 0
			;sets journal if he's following you in Molag Mar within 512 units
			;note that this does NOT stop him from following you, etc.
		endif
	endif
endif

End
